poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The actor feigned emotion
Flailed and floundered
Failed to impress.
The author fared no worse;
Famed, or let's say
Known for his frayed
Flared jeans and undecidable face,
What though he'd flayed his tongue
And framed phonetics for his ditties.
His readership faded with the denim.
